name: My Horrible Project
description:
A purposely badly made horror game.

 You want to know why? I participated in the BadJam!, a game Jam where we were challenged to make a bad game. The reason being the creator of the Jam not being able to make a bad game, "Every game I make must be well-polished, must have an icon and display name, the movement must be tight and fun..." 89o said.

I took the challenge and this is what came out of it. I probably could have made it worse, but I think it is pretty bad as it is now. Give it a try! If you think this was fun and good, my mission is failed !

How to play:

- W,A,(S),D  or Arrow Keys to move.

- That's it.

(If you are asking, I spent 8 hours to make this game)
